summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4046 for the improvement of North and East 51st Street, and North and East 52nd Street, each from Keystone Place to Latona Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48861, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
